__e: Inherent in her message were words even the most craven of us can ill afford to ignore.
George is no more of a coward than I am.
Sort my gutless brother, if you'd like.
Although I'm a coward, I encounter a lot of problems because of it.
My father is a coward, so I have to break it to my mother.
And you can either die like a man, and walk outside there by yourself, or you can die like a coward and get my wife and my children killed along with you.
This man shows up here with a skunk in a sheet telling everyone I'm not who I am.
Unfortunately we've already had our first fall, killed by a coward who deserves the same fate, but that's not up to me.
